    • Method Detail

      • calculateComplexitySimpleCalcule

        public String calculateComplexitySimpleCalcule(String path,
                                               ResourceBundle messages)
                                        throws IOException
        This method calculate the cyclomatic complexity of a file from path variable. This calcule is found in many tools of other programming languages
        Parameters:
        path - the path of the file to be analysed.
        messages - list of messages in all available languages
        Returns:
        the string with the result
        Throws:
        IOException - in case that file is not opened.
